Sentencas: The high oxygen permeability combined with reasonable structural stability of perovskite-type ABO(3-delta) compounds is vital for their potential applications in gas separation, solid oxide fuel cells, sensors, etc.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: Hence, an attempt is made to develop SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-delta-based dense membranes with sol-gel-derived oxalates and study their phase stability and oxygen permeation.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: While X-ray diffraction confirms the presence of a perovskite-type cubic phase above 800 A degrees C, X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy reveals the presence of cobalt and iron in 3+ and 4+ oxidation states with O-2 (2-), O-2 (-) and O- species.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity increases up to a characteristic temperature and decreases slowly thereafter via pronounced carrier scattering.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: A 1.5-mm-thick membrane displays reasonable oxygen permeability of 1.05 x 10(-6) mol cm(-2)
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: s(-1) at 900 A degrees C but has inadequate stability.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: Partial substitution of iron with zirconium is shown to improve permeability and stability significantly.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes

Sentencas: Thus, SrCo0.8Fe0.15Zr0.05O3-delta membrane shows promise for oxygen permeation purposes.
Titulo: On the structural stability and oxygen permeation behavior of inorganic SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ membranes
